blogPost.title: What are the career advantages of a liberal arts education? Answer by Michael Roth, president of @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/unmKKJubvg https://t.co/HgFWk7JufB
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: リベラルアーツ教育のキャリア上の利点は何ですか？Answer by Michael Roth, president of @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/unmKKJubvg https://t.co/HgFWk7JufB
文科教育的职业优势是什么？由@Wesleyan_U的校长Michael Roth回答。https://t.co/unmKKJubvg https://t.co/HgFWk7JufB
文科教育的職業優勢是什麼？由@Wesleyan_U的校長Michael Roth回答。https://t.co/unmKKJubvg https://t.co/HgFWk7JufB

previous.title: What kinds of people do well on Jeopardy? Answer by @jenniferquail, 2nd place on Jeopardy's 2021 tournament of champions. https://t.co/Z6bAS2TfF2 https://t.co/JxIhtIwTcj

localize.full_text: どんな人がJeopardyで活躍するのか？Jeopardyの2021年チャンピオン大会で2位になった@jenniferquailさんの回答。https://t.co/Z6bAS2TfF2 https://t.co/JxIhtIwTcj
什么样的人在《危险》中表现良好？回答者：@jenniferquail，《危险》杂志2021年冠军赛第二名。https://t.co/Z6bAS2TfF2 https://t.co/JxIhtIwTcj
什麼樣的人在《危險》中表現良好？回答者：@jenniferquail，《危險》雜誌2021年冠軍賽第二名。https://t.co/Z6bAS2TfF2 https://t.co/JxIhtIwTcj

next.title: How can finance automation affect businesses? Answer by @ajhoag, Founder @teampay. https://t.co/aQ8lzAkA5A https://t.co/T0LjCgndNz

localize.full_text: ファイナンスオートメーションはビジネスにどのような影響を与えるか？回答者：@ajhoag, Founder @teampay. https://t.co/aQ8lzAkA5A https://t.co/T0LjCgndNz
财务自动化如何影响企业？由 @ajhoag, 创始人 @teampay 回答。https://t.co/aQ8lzAkA5A https://t.co/T0LjCgndNz
